name: Nikhil
p1_desc: Hamara khandu hazaron me ek hai. 1 in every 1000 children have been found to suffer from Compulsive Decluttering Disorder.Compulsive decluttering is a pattern of behavior that is characterized by an excessive desire to discard objects in one's home and living areas.
p2_desc: Poor Innocent Khandi has been mercilessly beaten multiple times for throwing pillows,keys and even a wingie named bukhari until the recent news about his disorder. Our boy, khandu is a Pingu-faced, wannabe cool, Gay, large-eyed semi-blind squid devoid of friends.
shortText2: For more on his profile please visit www.Bits-bosm.org, oops it shows that the website is now being handled by DVM.
